channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia’s stock misses out on the big chip rally after Broadcom earnings
item.description: One analyst noted that the type of AI chip Broadcom makes could pick up market share relative to “costly” graphics processing units.

item.title: I have two life-insurance policies, but ‘rude’ agents keep calling me to change the terms. How do I stop this harassment?
item.description: “The agent said that my policy is in jeopardy of lapsing.”

item.title: Broadcom’s stock sees its best day ever as investors get ‘a reason to dream’
item.description: Analysts found things to nitpick in Broadcom’s earnings but noted major resonance in AI.

item.title: AI’s emissions are about to skyrocket even further

item.title: Pika 2.0 launches in wake of Sora, integrating your own characters, objects, scenes in new AI videos
item.description: Advanced image recognition tech ensures these components are seamlessly integrated into AI generated videos, giving creators more control.

item.title: Cohere’s smallest, fastest R-series model excels at RAG, reasoning in 23 languages
item.description: Cohere's Command R7B uses RAG, features a context length of 128K, supports 23 languages and outperforms Gemma, Llama and Ministral.

item.title: ‘I hate to be the interfering mother-in-law’: My son bought a house with his wife — so why is his father-in-law on the deed?
item.description: “I asked him if he was also on the deed. He said yes.”

item.title: NotebookLM updates Business to Plus with more audio, lets all users interact with AI hosts
item.description: Google releases a new paid version of NotebookLM to enterprises, teams and power users, and offers new interactions with its audio feature.

item.title: My husband filed for divorce, but did not contribute one penny towards the mortgage. Is he entitled to half of our home?
item.description: “He forced me to pay every payment.”

item.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Projects, letting you organize files, chats in groups
item.description: Projects in ChatGPT allows users to create folders and add conversations and documents, bringing these capabilities together in one place.
